column1: You are A KEEPER OF BALANCE
column3: and you can cast divine spells. See your SPELL REFERENCE SHEET for details.

column1: You are IN TOUCH WITH THE NATURAL WORLD and can identify plants and animals.
THE TOUCH OF METAL IS COLD AND LIFELESS. You cannot wear metal armor.
You are WELL-GROUNDED. If you need to make a SAVE because of an effect associated with FIRE or LIGHTNING
column2: add a +2 bonus to your SAVING THROW.
